message: Let's start fair. I think this split is reasonable.
You started high, now it's my turn to be greedy!
Let's split it down the middle. I think this is the fairest way to avoid both of us losing out.
You want to split it down the middle? I'll take most of it, then!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better share than that. Let's work together to find a solution before we both lose more money.
You're getting desperate, I can smell it! I'll give you a bit more, but don't think I'm being generous
I'm still willing to compromise, but we need to find a solution before we both lose even more money.  Let's try to split the difference.
You're getting close to desperation, I can see it. I'll give you a tiny bit more, but don't think this is the last offer
This is my final offer. I'm willing to take a big loss, but if we don't come to an agreement, we both get nothing.
